name: TechVenue
overview:
What is TechVenue.com About? In a Few Words: “Worldwide Promoter of Technology-Related Business Events.”

In One Sentence: “TechVenue.com: Promoter of local & worldwide technology-related business events organized geographically in an easy-to-use set of calendars.”

TechVenue.com is honored to serve several groups… First of all, event seekers - simplifying the task of finding the events and organizations that meet your individual needs.

Secondly, event producers and coordinators - to simplify the task of getting the word out to an audience that is interested in what you have to offer.

Thirdly, formal business arrangements for online and print media outlets that need real-time updated event listings for their own use and distribution - facilitating accuracy and time saved from tracking events internally.

Finally, as far as search engines and awards go, try a Google search on “tech events” - we pass this reach on to event producers as affordable promotion services.
